Article.ArticleTitle: Two New Nonenolides from Diaporthe sp. SXZ-19, an Endophytic Fungus of Camptotheca Acuminata.

AbstractText: Two new nonenolides named diaportheolides A (1) and B (2) were isolated from the endophytic fungus Diaporthe sp. SXZ-19 of Camptotheca acuminata. The chemical structures of 1 and 2 were elucidated by spectroscopic analyses, including 1D- and 2D-NMR experiments and HR-ESI-MS data analysis. Their in vitro antibacterial activities are established to be insignificant.
